QuestData.Title: Atonement
QuestData.Description: Our history with the orcs is one of constant conflict, $n. We were once near driven to extinction due to their bloodlust and have since then avoided them even when not under demonic influence.$B$BYet, this retaliation... it's not what Sedai would've wanted. Speak with our elder, Amaan the Wise. He will help shed light on these events.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Amaan the Wise at the Temple of Telhamat in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: Can I offer you any assistance, $n? You sound troubled.
